description:
http://anidb.net/cr860 [Akamatsu Ken], the Love Hina manga author, makes a few appearences in the Love Hina anime.
http://anidb.net/a35 [Love Hina 14:]
When the Hinata-sou runs out of money everybody has to help earning money and Keitarou ends up as an assistant for a famous mangaka, where it is discovered that the sensei is living in a villa while his assistants are working like slaves.
http://anidb.net/a51 [Love Hina Christmas Special:]
When Shinobu and Kitsune are in in dire need of money to buy train tickets they meet Akamatsu and end up selling doujinshi at the Comiket for him in exchange for money. What would their reaction be if they knew the content.
http://anidb.net/a52 [Love Hina Spring Special:]
Just as Akamatsu-sensei is rejoicing the fact that the series finally ended and is about to go on a trip around the world on his personal luxury liner (which he bought from the money he made from series` sales), the Hinata-sou crew hijacks the ship to set out on their search for Keitarou. But not before making him apologise for giving everybody that much text during the series.
name: Akamatsu-sensei
